img_summary: The image shows a detailed 3D model of a bell with a worn, metallic texture. The bell features intricate carvings or inscriptions on its surface, suggesting cultural or mystical significance within the game. The top of the bell has a loop, indicating it can be hung or attached to something. The bottom edge of the bell has cut-out shapes, adding to its ornate design. This object is likely an important item within the game, possibly used for summoning, unlocking areas, or as part of a quest. There are no visible characters, enemies, or UI components in the image.
